ValidationRule.description: Child Case Response Received - not allowed on Child Cases
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISCHANGED( Status ) , ISPICKVAL(Status, "Child Case Response Received"), ISPICKVAL(Case_Type__c, "Child Case"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If this is a child case, choose "Response to Parent Case" instead - it will auto update the Parent Case to "Child Case Response Received"
